constraints_details.constraints_layer_description: NEIPOL Name: MC1  Maldens and Coombe
AIRCZ Type:: Gatwick Airport Wind Turbine Consultation Zone:Contact: The Safeguarding Department, Gatwick Airport Limited, 7th Floor Destinations Place, London Gatwick Airport, West Sussex, RH06 0NP

AIRCZ Type:: Heathrow Planning Consultation Zone: All buildings, structures, erections and works exceeding 90 metres in height (295.3 feet)Contact: The Safeguarding Department, Heathrow Airport Limited, c/o Planning Services, First Point, Buckingham Gate, Gatwick Airport, West Sussex, RH6 0NT

decision_conditions: The Council considers the amendments to be material and as such, it is recommended that a S96A application for a non-material amendment be refused.
description: Non Material Amendment to planning permission 22/02378/HOU (Demolition of existing rear extension, conversion of garage into habitable space, erection of two-storey side, part two storey/part single storey rear extension. Erection of roof extension with rear/ side dormer and rear juliet balcony and installation of 2 nos front rooflights to facilitate loft conversion. Internal alterations and associated rear landscaping.) to move the ground floor rear/ side wall towards the boundary by 160mm.
